variable.name: ButtonUnFocusColor
variable.description: בחירת צבע כפתורי תפריט לא נבחר

variable.name: tips
variable.value: [B]Featherence Support Team[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]We are offering support for all of our addons.[CR]For support send us an email to:[CR]featherence@groups.facebook.com[CR]Or visit our facebook support group:[CR]https://www.facebook.com/groups/featherence
[B]AutoView:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can force your preferred view for predefined categories such as: Movies/TVshows/Seasons/Episodes/Movies Set/Actors/Genre and more...
[B]Save/Load skin design:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can save your skin design and use that as backup or even share it with your friends.
[B]Coloring:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can color every piece of aspect in the skin.
[B]Resposition home buttons:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can easily move your buttons in the order you like.
[B]Sub Menu:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can activate sub menu for each button on your home screen.[CR]sub menu buttons are visible by the a small line at the top right button corner.
[B]Home views:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can change the home buttons position to panel/horizontal/vertical.
[B]Movies widget:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can easily access random unwatched movies in your library or recently added movies.[CR]You may also play trailers directly from the widget.
[B]TVshows widget:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can easily access your in progress TVshows or recently added episodes.[CR]You may also force refresh for triggering the next episode if needed.

[B]Share your ideas:[/B][CR]Would like to see something different?[CR]We want to hear you![CR]For requests send us an email to:[CR]featherence@groups.facebook.com[CR]Or visit our facebook group:[CR]https://www.facebook.com/groups/featherence
[B]Featherence Service:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can open Featherence Service addon for using prebuilt tools.
[B]Internet:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can open your web browser or network settings using Featherence settings's tab.
[B]Wall / Posters views:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can adjust those views settings using the View Settings in the left menu.

[B]Movies/TVshows/Actors/Directors Information:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can view extra information for those using the movies/tvshows information window and selecting the director/actor/more button information.
[B]Date and Hours:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can change the dates and hours display to your like.
[B]Transperancy:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can adjust the transperancy for every piece of aspect in the skin.
[B]Music & Video on startup:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can choose your favourite song and/or video to be launch on startup
[B]Align Plot[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can adjust the plot align in the skin settings window.
[B]Rating method:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can tweak the rating method for videos/movies/tvshows in the skin settings window.

[B]Do you want to contribute?:[/B][CR]Want to start your way as developer?[CR]We welcome you to join us![CR]For joining the team send us an email to:[CR]featherence@groups.facebook.com[CR]Or visit our facebook group:[CR]https://www.facebook.com/groups/featherence
[B]Custom icons/backgrounds path:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can setup a custom path to be used when changing a button's icon / fanart.
[B]Reset icons/backgrounds to default:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can easily reset a specific button's icon/fanart.
[B]Main color:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can setup main color to be used across the entire skin.
[B]Disable Buttons:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can disable buttons to be hidden.[CR]The buttons will appear on the skin design window but may be hidden there too!
[B]Reposition Sub Buttons:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can instantly switch positions of sub buttons if there are more then two items.
[B]Video OSD extended:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can view extra buttons in the video OSD using the up key on the stop button.
[B]Subtitle button[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can adjust the subtitle using the up/down arrows when standing on the subtitle button.[CR]You may also use the J / K buttons.
[B]Reset Design[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can reset your skin design to default without effecting the buttons you have created or others skin settings - design only!
[B]Random Design[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can randomize your skin design to see a wide range of options in no time.

[B]Have an idea for new addon?:[/B][CR]Is it that great?[CR]Come and share it with us![CR]send us an email to:[CR]featherence@groups.facebook.com[CR]Or visit our facebook group:[CR]https://www.facebook.com/groups/featherence

[B]Password lock button:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can set a password for a button so it's be accessible for you only![CR]For more information visit our facebook group:[CR]https://www.facebook.com/groups/featherence
[B]Multi fanart:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can set a multi fanart for a button.
[B]Access Sub Menu in a different way:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can use the Sub Menu action option to open the sub menu by clicking the down arrow only!
[B]Big icons:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can enlarge your prefered icons to be match your prefered buttons shapes.

[B]Touch Screen support[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can enable touch screen support for your touch devices![CR]For more information visit our facebook group:[CR]https://www.facebook.com/groups/featherence
[B]Reset default buttons names/icons:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can change the language of the default buttons by clicking on that option in the skin design window!
[B]Action and Thumbnail:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can setup this option in order to make any new action to appear with a label and icon instantly!
[B]Fanart-Sub Menu:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can setup each sub to be with it's own fanart!
[B]Fanart-Home Full Screen:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can setup your fanart for buttons to appear on the whole screen or just outside the buttons!
[B]Reshape Icons:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can reshape your custom icons to match the current button's shape!
[B]Menu Buttons 2D:[/B][CR]Did you know?[CR]You can setup the whole skin's buttons to appear in 2D mode!
